name: Escape (itch) (Fork Team)
description:
Challenge your mind with Virtual Reality!

Are you able to escape from maze ? If your answer is yes, download the game, take your VR headset and get your stars in the game. If no, take a minute to read the description below...

We have created a VR maze game called Escape . The game could be played by any age category who is interested in. 

Escape.  Once you play the game, you would easily grasp the idea why the game is called Escape.  Let me keep in secret! 

The game is pretty simple to play. It has a game menu which posses 3 buttons: 'Play', 'Sound' and 'Info'. As you press the button 'Play', you will appear in the maze. 3 stars are hidden in the maze. The unique rule of the game to win is to collect all 3 stars.

The game is designed using one of the most powerful programming languages C# and the program Unity Engine and Visual Studio 2019 IDE.

Escape can be played only on Android platforms for now. In future, we would design it for iOS platforms too.

If you have any questions about the game or team, contact t.me/brackeys or t.me/abdujalolerkinov

Thanks for your attention! Feel free to leave your thoughts about our work, we value them!
